TI_TEXT.P: Строителни и монтажни работи по общо изграждане на сгради
Lavori generali di costruzione di edifici

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: West Lothian Civic Centre, Howden South Road

SHORT_DESCR.P: WLC award a framework for trades contractors to supplement their Building Services department. This was split into 14 trade lots. Tenders were submitted for individual or all lots.
Estimated values of works are based on full four year framework and value of works not guaranteed.
Framework of bricklayer and stone work contractors for small works, maintenance and reactive repairs.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: It may be required for contractors to carry out works not listed in the National Schedule of Rates in the tender. Prices for this work will be agreed in advance and any applicable rates will be fixed for future requirements.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: It may be required for contractors to carry out works not listed in the National Schedule of Rates in the tender. Prices for this work will be agreed in advance and any applicable rates will be fixed for future requirements.
